SEARCH
Package org.vulcanium.util.io

Class VulcaniumObjectOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.ObjectOutputStream
org.vulcanium.util.io.VulcaniumObjectOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, ObjectOutput, ObjectStreamConstants, AutoCloseable
public class VulcaniumObjectOutputStream extends ObjectOutputStream
This class is designed to be used in conjunction with the ConfigurationSerializable API. It translates objects to an internal implementation for later deserialization using VulcaniumObjectInputStream.

Behavior of implementations extending this class is not guaranteed across future versions.
